page.title: 14HOBBIES
page.content:
To give an indication of the types of hobbies and activities that the children in Gilberdyke are interested in, in 1985, the following list was compiled after discussion with ten and eleven year old children.
This list gives an indication of the group and individual activities which occupy the children during their free moments outside school time and during the school holidays.
music lessons board games listening to music swimming gymnastics helping parents bee keeping stamp collecting football cycling computers dancing horse riding reading
